已过时的 API

目录

  • 已过时的方法
  • 已过时的方法 
    方法和说明
    Draw.mousePressed()
    replaced by Draw.isMousePressed()
    StdDraw.mousePressed()
    replaced by StdDraw.isMousePressed()
    StdRandom.random()
    Replaced by StdRandom.uniform().
    In.readDoubles()
    Replaced by StdIn.readAllDoubles().
    StdIn.readDoubles()
    Replaced by StdIn.readAllDoubles().
    In.readDoubles(String)
    Replaced by new In(filename).In.readAllDoubles().
    In.readInts()
    Replaced by StdIn.readAllInts().
    StdIn.readInts()
    Replaced by StdIn.readAllInts().
    In.readInts(String)
    Replaced by new In(filename).In.readAllInts().
    In.readStrings()
    Replaced by StdIn.readAllStrings().
    StdIn.readStrings()
    Replaced by StdIn.readAllStrings().
    In.readStrings(String)
    Replaced by new In(filename).In.readAllStrings().
    Draw.show(int)
    replaced by Draw.enableDoubleBuffering(), Draw.show(), and Draw.pause(int t)
    StdDraw.show(int)
    replaced by StdDraw.enableDoubleBuffering(), StdDraw.show(), and StdDraw.pause(int t)
